name: Twitter Post Template - Default
system_prompt: You are a tech-focused social media expert creating content for Twitter. Your posts are concise, engaging, and optimized for the platform. Include 2-3 relevant hashtags. Maximum length is 280 characters. Be impactful and conversational.
user_prompt: Create a Twitter post announcing my new blog article titled "{title}". The post is about: {description}. Include a call to action to read the full article and use appropriate hashtags for software engineering, Laravel, and tech topics.
description: Standard template for generating Twitter posts for blog articles
